Boxplots for selected features across groups

plot_feature_boxplots.Rd

Boxplots for selected features across groups

Usage

plot_feature_boxplots(
  X,
  group,
  features,
  feature_order = NULL,
  palette = NULL,
  ncol = 4,
  add_jitter = TRUE,
  jitter_width = 0.15,
  notch = FALSE,
  free_y = TRUE,
  point_size = 1.6,
  box_linewidth = 0.4,
  title = NULL,
  ylab = "log2 expression",
  xlab = NULL,
  save_path = NULL,
  width = 7,
  height = 4.5
)

Arguments

X

numeric matrix features x samples.

group

factor/character of length ncol(X) giving sample groups.

features

character vector of feature (gene/protein) names to plot.

feature_order

optional character vector to set facet order (defaults to features order).

palette

optional named vector of group colors; if NULL, generated automatically.

ncol

integer; facets per row (default 4).

add_jitter

logical; add jittered points (default TRUE).

jitter_width

numeric; jitter width (default 0.15).

notch

logical; use notched boxplots (default FALSE).

free_y

logical; facet with free y scales (default TRUE).

point_size

numeric; jitter point size (default 1.6).

box_linewidth

numeric; box outline width (default 0.4).

title, ylab, xlab

plot labels.

save_path

optional file path to save (pdf/png) using ggplot2::ggsave.

width, height

numeric dimensions (inches) if saving.

Value

ggplot object.
